Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.sem.reports

Class ConsumptionReport

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.sem.reports.ConsumptionReport
public class ConsumptionReport extends Object
Report that contains information about the consumption of resources by devices. Singleton class.
